com.github.davidmoten.grumpy.wms

Interface Layer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomLayer, DarknessLayer, FiddleLayer

    public interface Layer
    Renders or displays info about positions on a WMS layer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LayerFeatures getFeatures()
      Returns features about the WMS layer including styles, supported CRS and the default name of the layer.
      String getInfo(Date time, WmsRequest request, Point point, String mimeType)
      Returns info about the given point on the layer formatted as per the requested mimeType.
      void render(Graphics2D g, WmsRequest request)
      Render some information onto the supplied graphics context

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Graphics2D g,
          WmsRequest request)
        Render some information onto the supplied graphics context
        Parameters:
        g - - the graphics context used for rendering
        bounds - - the geo-spatial bounding box of the region to be rendered
        width - - of the graphics area in pixels
        height - - of the graphics area in pixels
